tags.name: lerndesign-gallery-behaviors
tags.description:
`lerndesign-gallery-behaviors`
A set of properties for lerndesign-gallery components.

Events:

  * `item-changed` {`CustomEvent<any>`} - Handles changes in selected item by firing an event to the gallery

Attributes:

  * `anchorData` - a named anchor for the gallery

  * `galleryId` {`string`} - gallery's unique id

  * `gallery-title` {`string`} - gallery's title

  * `layout` {`string`} - layout type: currently masonry, carousel, and grid

  * `title` {`string`} - DEPRECATED gallery's title

  * `aspectRatio` {`number`} - aspect ratio of media

  * `extra-wide` {`boolean`} - size for responsive CSS

  * `grid` {`boolean`} - 

  * `responsive-size` {`string`} - parent size for responsive styling

  * `selected` - id of item

  * `sizing` {`string`} - default sizing: fit screen by cropping (cover)
or with letterboxing (contain)

  * `sources` {`any[]`} - array of gallery items

  * `accent-color` {`string`} - a selected accent-"color": grey, red, pink, purple, etc.

  * `dark` {`boolean`} - make the default theme dark?

Properties:

  * `anchorData` - a named anchor for the gallery

  * `galleryId` {`string`} - gallery's unique id

  * `galleryTitle` {`string`} - gallery's title

  * `layout` {`string`} - layout type: currently masonry, carousel, and grid

  * `title` {`string`} - DEPRECATED gallery's title

  * `aspectRatio` {`number`} - aspect ratio of media

  * `extraWide` {`boolean`} - size for responsive CSS

  * `grid` {`boolean`} - 

  * `responsiveSize` {`string`} - parent size for responsive styling

  * `selected` - id of item

  * `sizing` {`string`} - default sizing: fit screen by cropping (cover)
or with letterboxing (contain)

  * `sources` {`any[]`} - array of gallery items

  * `accentColor` {`string`} - a selected accent-"color": grey, red, pink, purple, etc.

  * `dark` {`boolean`} - make the default theme dark?

  * `colors` -

tags.name: lrndesign-gallery-carousel
tags.description:
`lrndesign-gallery-carousel`
An element that renders a collection of gallery items into a carousel or a single media item into a layout.

### Styling

`<lrndesign-gallery-carousel>` provides following custom properties and mixins
for styling:

Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
`--lrndesign-gallery-color` | text color | --simple-colors-default-theme-grey-12
`--lrndesign-gallery-background-color` | background color | --simple-colors-default-theme-grey-2
`--lrndesign-gallery-border-color` | subtle border color | --simple-colors-default-theme-grey-4
`--lrndesign-gallery-focus-color` | accent color | --simple-colors-default-theme-accent-9
`--lrndesign-gallery-thumbnail-outline` | thumbnail outline color | 1px solid var(--simple-colors-default-theme-grey-12);
`--lrndesign-gallery-dialog-color` | zoom dialog text color | --simple-colors-default-theme-grey-12
`--lrndesign-gallery-dialog-background-color` | zoom dialog background-color | --simple-colors-default-theme-grey-1
`--lrndesign-gallery-dialog-titlebar-color` | zoom dialog title bar text color | --simple-colors-default-theme-grey-1
`--lrndesign-gallery-dialog-titlebar-background-color` | zoom dialog title bar background-color | --simple-colors-default-theme-accent-9
`--lrndesign-gallery-dialog-header-color` | zoom dialog header bar text color | --simple-colors-default-theme-grey-12
`--lrndesign-gallery-dialog-header-background-color` | zoom dialog header bar background-color | --simple-colors-default-theme-grey-2
`--lrndesign-gallery-carousel-next-bg` | gradient on carousel next button | linear-gradient(to right,rgba(255, 255, 255, 0) 0%,rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5) 50%,rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.7) 70%,rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9) 90%);
`--lrndesign-gallery-carousel-prev-bg` | gradient on carousel prev button | linear-gradient(to right,rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9) 10%,rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.7) 30%,rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5) 50%,rgba(255, 255, 255, 0) 100%);

Events:

  * `item-changed` {`CustomEvent<any>`} - Handles changes in selected item by firing an event to the gallery

Attributes:

  * `anchorData` - a named anchor for the gallery

  * `galleryId` {`string`} - gallery's unique id

  * `gallery-title` {`string`} - gallery's title

  * `layout` {`string`} - layout type: currently masonry, carousel, and grid

  * `title` {`string`} - DEPRECATED gallery's title

  * `aspectRatio` {`number`} - aspect ratio of media

  * `extra-wide` {`boolean`} - size for responsive CSS

  * `grid` {`boolean`} - 

  * `responsive-size` {`string`} - parent size for responsive styling

  * `selected` - id of item

  * `sizing` {`string`} - default sizing: fit screen by cropping (cover)
or with letterboxing (contain)

  * `sources` {`any[]`} - array of gallery items

  * `accent-color` {`string`} - a selected accent-"color": grey, red, pink, purple, etc.

  * `dark` {`boolean`} - make the default theme dark?

Properties:

  * `hideNav` {`boolean`} - gets whether navigation should be hidden

  * `anchorData` - a named anchor for the gallery

  * `galleryId` {`string`} - gallery's unique id

  * `galleryTitle` {`string`} - gallery's title

  * `layout` {`string`} - layout type: currently masonry, carousel, and grid

  * `title` {`string`} - DEPRECATED gallery's title

  * `aspectRatio` {`number`} - aspect ratio of media

  * `extraWide` {`boolean`} - size for responsive CSS

  * `grid` {`boolean`} - 

  * `responsiveSize` {`string`} - parent size for responsive styling

  * `selected` - id of item

  * `sizing` {`string`} - default sizing: fit screen by cropping (cover)
or with letterboxing (contain)

  * `sources` {`any[]`} - array of gallery items

  * `accentColor` {`string`} - a selected accent-"color": grey, red, pink, purple, etc.

  * `dark` {`boolean`} - make the default theme dark?

  * `colors` -

tags.name: lrndesign-gallery-zoom
tags.description:
`lrndesign-gallery-zoom`
An element that renders the zoom feature for the gallery.

Events:

  * `gallery-zoom` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `heading` {`string`} - heading for zoom modal

  * `details` {`string`} - details for zoom modal

  * `src` {`string`} - Image source.

  * `tooltip` {`string`} - tooltip for the zoom button

  * `zoom-alt` {`string`} - gallery item's alt text

Properties:

  * `figures` {`{ src: string; info: TemplateResult<1>; }[]`} - 

  * `toolbars` {`{ bottom: { id: string; type: string; contents: string[]; }; }`} - 

  * `button` {`false | Element | null`} - 

  * `modal` {`false | Element | null`} - 

  * `heading` {`string`} - heading for zoom modal

  * `details` {`string`} - details for zoom modal

  * `src` {`string`} - Image source.

  * `tooltip` {`string`} - tooltip for the zoom button

  * `zoomAlt` {`string`} - gallery item's alt text

`lrndesign-gallery`
displays images as a carousel or grid with the ability to zoom

  * `responsive-element` {`CustomEvent<{ element: this; attribute: string; sm: number; md: number; lg: number; xl: number; }>`} - 

  * `item-changed` {`CustomEvent<any>`} - Handles changes in selected item by firing an event to the gallery

Attributes:

tags.name: lrndesign-gallery
tags.description:
`lrndesign-gallery`
displays images as a carousel or grid with the ability to zoom

Events:

  * `responsive-element` {`CustomEvent<{ element: this; attribute: string; sm: number; md: number; lg: number; xl: number; }>`} - 

Properties:

  * `aspect` {`number`} - gets aspect ratio of images

  * `extra` {`boolean`} - gets aspect ratio of an image and
determine if aspect ratio is extra wide

  * `items` - gets items array

  * `observer` - mutation observer for tabs

  * `sources` {`never[]`} - 

  * `sizing` {`string`} -
